Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a discounted rate. Should you choose to accept this offer, I am confident it will be a mutually beneficial decision. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
